import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAlert } from 'react-alert' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' // import { login, clearError } from '../../actions/userAction' import Loader from '../layout/Loader' import MetaData from '../layout/MetaData' import { Loginbg, Logobg } from '../images/Images' const Login = ({ history }) => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const alert = useAlert() const dispatch = useDispatch() const { isAuthenticated, error, loading } = useSelector(state => state.auth) useEffect(() => { if (isAuthenticated) { history.push('/') } if (error) { alert.error(error); // dispatch(clearError()) } }, [dispatch, alert, isAuthenticated, error, history]) return ( {loading ? : (
setEmail(e.target.value)} label="E-mail" placeholder="E-mail" /> setPassword(e.target.value)} label="Password" placeholder="Password" />
Lupa Password? Daftar

setEmail(e.target.value)} label="E-mail" placeholder="E-mail" /> setPassword(e.target.value)} label="Password" placeholder="Password" />

) } ) } export default Login
